issue_meta.title: Wolverine (2003) #25
issue_meta.description:
"ENEMY OF THE STATE" Conclusion!
Tough love takes on a whole new meaning when Wolverine, brainwashed and evil, comes home to the X-Mansion for his most damaging Hydra mission yet. Are the X-Men and Nick Fury ready for him? The blistering storyline speeds to a breakneck conclusion you have to see to believe!

prev_issue_meta.title: Wolverine (2003) #24
prev_issue_meta.description:
"Enemy of the State"
The frenzy of destruction shows no sign of stopping as a brainwashed Wolverine locks down New York during his deadly mission for Hydra and the Hand. His next target: Daredevil! Part 5 (of 6).

next_issue_meta.title: Wolverine (2003) #26
next_issue_meta.description:
"AGENT OF S.H.I.E.L.D." Part 1 of 6
Wolverine may be back in S.H.I.E.L.D. custody, but at what cost? As the X-Men mourn their fallen team-mate in a funeral befitting a hero, Hydra celebrates the coronation of a new leader. And the reign of terror continues, as The Hand picks off the meta-humans, one by one... Will Wolverine be deprogrammed in time to stop the carnage? Plus, the secret origin of the Gorgon!
32 PGS./Marvel PSR+ ...$2.25
